psalm.title: Psalms
psalm.text:
[[Ps 34,2]]I will bless the LORD at all times; 
his praise shall be ever in my mouth.
[[Ps 34,3]]Let my soul glory in the LORD; 
the lowly will hear me and be glad.

[[Ps 34,4]]Glorify the LORD with me, 
let us together extol his name.
[[Ps 34,5]]I sought the LORD, and he answered me 
and delivered me from all my fears.

[[Ps 34,6]]Look to him that you may be radiant with joy, 
and your faces may not blush with shame.
[[Ps 34,7]]When the poor one called out, the LORD heard, 
and from all his distress he saved him.

[[Ps 34,8]]The angel of the LORD encamps 
around those who fear him, and delivers them.
[[Ps 34,9]]Taste and see how good the LORD is; 
blessed the man who takes refuge in him.

[[Ps 34,10]]Fear the LORD, you his holy ones, 
for nought is lacking to those who fear him.
[[Ps 34,11]]The great grow poor and hungry; 
but those who seek the LORD want for no good thing.

gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint John
gospel.text:
[[Jn 11,19]]Many of the Jews had come to Martha and Mary to comfort them about their brother [Lazarus, who had died].
[[Jn 11,20]]When Martha heard that Jesus was coming, she went to meet him; but Mary sat at home.
[[Jn 11,21]]Martha said to Jesus, "Lord, if you had been here, my brother would not have died.
[[Jn 11,22]]But even now I know that whatever you ask of God, God will give you."
[[Jn 11,23]]Jesus said to her, "Your brother will rise."
[[Jn 11,24]]Martha said to him, "I know he will rise, in the resurrection on the last day."
[[Jn 11,25]]Jesus told her, "I am the resurrection and the life; whoever believes in me, even if he dies, will live,
[[Jn 11,26]]and everyone who lives and believes in me will never die. Do you believe this?"
[[Jn 11,27]]She said to him, "Yes, Lord. I have come to believe that you are the Messiah, the Son of God, the one who is coming into the world."

first_reading.title: First Letter of John
first_reading.text:
[[1_Jn 4,7]]Beloved, let us love one another, because love is of God; everyone who loves is begotten by God and knows God.
[[1_Jn 4,8]]Whoever is without love does not know God, for God is love.
[[1_Jn 4,9]]In this way the love of God was revealed to us: God sent his only Son into the world so that we might have life through him.
[[1_Jn 4,10]]In this is love: not that we have loved God, but that he loved us and sent his Son as expiation for our sins.
[[1_Jn 4,11]]Beloved, if God so loved us, we also must love one another.
[[1_Jn 4,12]]No one has ever seen God. Yet, if we love one another, God remains in us, and his love is brought to perfection in us.
[[1_Jn 4,13]]This is how we know that we remain in him and he in us, that he has given us of his Spirit.
[[1_Jn 4,14]]Moreover, we have seen and testify that the Father sent his Son as savior of the world.
[[1_Jn 4,15]]Whoever acknowledges that Jesus is the Son of God, God remains in him and he in God.
[[1_Jn 4,16]]We have come to know and to believe in the love God has for us. God is love, and whoever remains in love remains in God and God in him.
